front.title: Accommodating an MTU/MRU greater than 1492 in PPPoE

abstract.t: Point-to-Point Protocol Over Ethernet (PPPoE), as described in RFC 2516 [1], mandates a maximum negotiated MRU of 1492. This document outlines a solution to relax that restriction and allow a maximum negotiated MRU greater than 1492 to minimize fragmentation in next generation broadband networks.
